name: dedicatedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you believe that something is very important and will give a lot of time and energy to it: Both parties are dedicatedly and proudly liberal. We need to have a workforce that has a life outside work, and that also works dedicatedly. Related word
dedicated
More examplesFewer examplesThanks to my family for dedicatedly driving three hours to be here today.Service at the restaurant was exceptional, with all waiting staff dedicatedly knowing the details of the menu.The two big prizes and the best actor and actress awards went to a pair of dedicatedly uncommercial films.
